content: description introducing the wisteria sweater a chic crochet pattern designed for an intermediate skill level this cropped pullover boasts a flattering v-neck and wide ribbing for both style and comfort the intricate texture adds a touch of elegance to the design perfect for those seeking a satisfying challenge this pattern strikes a balance between sophistication and creativity this sweater is free on my blog 1 find the kit on lion brand 2 the kit comes with all the yarn needed to make the sweater plus a free copy of the digital pdf download you can also customize your yarn colors i have a full video tutorial available for this pattern 3 thanks for subscribing for more free content 1 https //www eandpcrochet com/the-wisteria-sweater-crochet-pattern/ 2 http //shrsl com/4cggf 3 https //youtu be/vlgd1cvgu90
